'''''"Potapo's Solidarity"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Biting-Cold Wayob Manifestation|text="Potapo's Solidarity" &mdash; Will of Rivalry and Battle}} and fully restore the HP of every Protection Spirit.
